features.name: Birthday System
features.description: Allow members to see their exact ages

features.name: Reaction Handler
features.description: Who performs an action or assigns a role

features.name: Leveling System
features.description: Allow members to see the **number of messages** they have sent, the **time** they have spent in voice, their **level** and **experience** (calculation system inspired by <:MEE6:829711873607860274> MEE6)
features.rich_description: Allow members to see the [b]number of messages[/b] they have sent, the [b]time[/b] they have spent in voice, their [b]level[/b] and [b]experience[/b] (calculation system inspired by MEE6)

features.name: Ticket System
features.description: Like on this server but with more features (no database required)

features.name: Steam API
features.description: Allow members to have information about Steam user

features.name: Minecraft API
features.description: Allow members to have information about Minecraft player

features.name: Hypixel API
features.description: Allow members to have information about Hypixel player

features.name: Logger System
features.description: Avatar, Bot, DM, Guild, Join and Leave, Nickname, Roles, Username, Voice

features.name: Spotify API
features.description: Allow members to share their Spotify activity

features.name: Blockchain API
features.description: Allow members to see the current price of Bitcoin

features.name: Leaderboard
features.description: Allow members to view a ranking about any value (e.g.: messages, experience, points, coins, etc.)

features.name: Voice State
features.description: Allow members to have information about their voice session

features.name: Basic Commands
features.description: Help, Avatar

features.name: Moderation Commands
features.description: Mute, Unmute, Ban, Unban, Kick

features.name: Activity Updater
features.description: Allows you to change the activity of your bot every X seconds

features.name: Confession System
features.description: Allow your members to confess while being anonymous

features.name: Suggestion System
features.description: Allow your members to share their suggestions

features.name: Email Sender
features.description: Allows you to send an email to any address (useful for double authentication)

features.name: Giphy API
features.description: Allows you to retrieve any gif from the internet

features.name: Sniper
features.description: Famous feature of the Dank Memer bot that allows to display the last deleted or modified message

features.name: Pinboard
features.description: Allows you to pin your favorite messages so they never disappear (we use Imgur to save the images)

features.name: Twitter API
features.description: Allows you to retrieve tweets from your favorite accounts in real time

features.name: Vouch System
features.description: Allows you to add or remove reputation points while giving your opinion on a user

features.name: Discord Bot List API
features.description: Allows you to collect member's votes and give out any awards

features.name: Counter Strike API
features.description: Allow your members to retrieve information about their CS:GO profile like the value of an item or their inventory
